fr.playsoft.android.tools.customcomponents.interfaces

Interface IRefreshable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PullToUpdateList, UltraDualView, UltraGallery, UltraGallery.UltraGalleryAdapter, UltraGrid, UltraList, UltraListDocked, UltraListTouch, UltraMultiSwipe, UltraMultiSwipe.UltraMultiSwipeAdapter, UltraSwipe, UltraSwipe.UltraSwipeAdapter, UltraSwipeListCell, UltraSwipeListCell.UltraSwipeAdapter

    public interface IRefreshable
    Interface for refreshing views. If something is refreshable it means it can be forced to update view (for example if images were missing).
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void refreshView()
      Refreshes currently visible view.
      void refreshViewAndData()
      Refreshes currently visible view and reinitializes data.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshView

        void refreshView()
        Refreshes currently visible view. To be used if for example missing images have been downloaded.

      • refreshViewAndData

        void refreshViewAndData()
        Refreshes currently visible view and reinitializes data. Should refetch all data, to be used if there were some structure changes.
